settings.offer_1_content: If you spend over $200 USD (before tax), you'll receive a free hat with your order. Simply choose any hat, and its cost will be automatically discounted to 100% in your shopping cart.

settings.question: Do you ship internationally?
settings.answer: Yes, we ship to the UK, Australia, and Canada. Shipping costs will apply, and will be added at checkout. We run discounts and promotions all year, so stay tuned for exclusive deals.

settings.question: How long will it take to get my order?
settings.answer: Please allow up to 7-10 business days for your order to ship. If your order contains an item that is ready to ship and an item that ships in two weeks, your entire order will be shipped together when all items are ready for shipment. Delivery details will be provided in your confirmation email.

settings.question: Can I return my order?
settings.answer:
All Sales Are Final. If your item has a quality issue you can exchange your order within 14 days of receiving it. Please email us at info@eightyfour.com with photos and a description of what is wrong with the product and we will replace it, and cover the shipping cost.

Once the proposed exchange is reviewed and the process is complete, you will be emailed a return label. We will happily exchange your item.

They must arrive back to us no later than 28 days from the delivery date.

settings.question: Can I get free shipping?
settings.answer: Yes we offer free shipping on orders over $300 USD.

settings.question: Can I buy now and pay later?
Can I cancel my order?
settings.answer:
Once you have placed your order we are unable to cancel. We work hard to ensure your order is processed quickly. We do this to make sure you get your order in the quickest time possible. If you need to amend a size or address please email us ASAP after ordering at info@eightyfour.com.

We do offer exchanges if your item(s) have any issues with them. Please see above for more info on exchanges.

Please keep your proof of postage safe until your return is confirmed via email.

settings.question: Can I exchange my order if I order the wrong size?
settings.answer: We do not offer direct exchanges in size for the same product. If you would like to exchange your item as a result of a quality issue upon receipt please see above.

settings.question: Why did only half my order show up?
settings.answer: We have a few items that are delivered from a seperate location. Don't worry, we cover the cost of the second shipment! Please allow a few days for the second package to arrive. If you are concerned of it's whereabouts please reach out to info@eightyfour.com.

settings.question: How do duty charges on foreign packages work?
settings.answer: We do not cover duty charges for international shipments. Please take this into account when ordering from outside the United States.
